TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit StrokeCollectionChangedEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.StrokesChanged> event occurs whenever a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> is added or removed from a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection added, class System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection removed) cil managed

Docs.param: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"> that contains the added strokes.
A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"> that contains the removed strokes.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollectionChangedEventArgs"> class.
Gets the strokes that have been added to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection">.
Docs.value: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"> that contains the added strokes.

Docs.summary: Gets the strokes that have been removed from the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection">.
Docs.value: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"> that contains the removed strokes.
